features: What You Get: One 32 oz. bottle of Original Sprout Deep Conditioner for all hair types and textures, including color-treated hair

Repairs & Smooths: Gentle, effective formula is made with Hawaiian kukui seed oil to help repair damaged hair and deliver silky smooth results; infused with soothing calendula, cucumber, arnica, and rosemary

For Deep Conditioning: Apply to freshly shampooed hair, leave on for 5 minutes and rinse; for deeper conditioning treatment, wrap conditioned hair in warm towel for up to 15 minutes; mild pH of 6.0-7.0 suitable for all ages

Vegan & Cruelty-Free: Contains nourishing extracts from fruits, vegetables, and flowers; vegan and cruelty-free with no parabens or phthalates; free of soy, gluten, honey, peanut, and dairy; dermatologist-tested, hypoallergenic, and non-irritating

Made in the USA: With a focus on family-centric, personal care products, Original Sprout was created to ensure a future where families thrive alongside a healthy planet; produced and packaged in California, USA

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Repair hair leaving it silky and smooth

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Original Sprout Deep Conditioner Our Deep Conditioner is infused with Hawaiian kukui seed oil to help repair hair, leaving it silky and smooth. Apply onto ends for optimal moisture and movement, leave on hair for at least five minutes. For a deeper treatment, try wrapping hair in a warm towel or shower cap for 15 minutes to help the ingredients penetrate deeper before rinsing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love the smell!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the scent of this. It is very light and clean smelling. It is appropriately thick and moisturizes very well. I use this deep conditioner on my daughters’ hair who both have biracial curly hair. I put it on and comb it through, then rinse it out and it leaves their hair shiny, smelling good, and untangled. I would highly recommend it to anyone who wants a quality conditioner without all of the dangerous/damaging chemicals or ingredients. It is 100% vegan and cruelty free, also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Organic Allergen Free Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I got this conditioner for my daughter who has many allergies, including dairy and gluten and sesame. Though many people think, what's the problem, you're not eating your shampoo/conditioner/soap - your skin is your largest organ and absorbs quite a bit. So it is important to me to purchase products that I feel good about and are safe for my children. It's hard to find a conditioner that actually detangles her hair. I have gone through sooooo many products. I found only two conditioners I absolutely loved and this is one of them! Loved it so much I bought this big 33oz for my shower, lol!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love both the shampoo and the conditioner for my 11 ...
reviews.reviewText: We love both the shampoo and the conditioner for my 11 year old daughters hair. She has thick, curly hair and most all other things we have tried have not worked. However, since we have been using these products her hair is beautiful, soft but most importantly moisturized! She had super dry frizzy hair before we started using these products. I had to cut 7 inches off her hair because she could never get all the rats out. These products have made her hair manageable for "her" to take care of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this product for two weeks so far. I will admit that this product is rather pricey but it is well worth the price. Let me start off by saying that I am an African American woman with 4b relaxed hair. I had been looking for an organic conditioner. And let me just say I love this conditioner. On my first use my hair was super soft and detangling was a breeze for my bra strap length hair. Yep-no tangles and the days following I was able to tell that my hair was still well moisturized. I did not need as much product for my daily moisturizing and sealing. Saving to splurge on this product will be a definte for me, but I will do whatever it takes to make this a staple!! Original Sprout 33 oz Deep Conditioner is a God send!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for fine hair
reviews.reviewText: We love this conditioner so much for our daughter. Her hair is so fine and thin, and gets tangled easily. This conditioner leaves her hair so soft and not greasy, it smells great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is one of my favorite hair products
reviews.reviewText: This is one of my favorite hair products. My two kids both have really curly hair and this helps to be able to comb through it better. I use it all the time even after the shower it helps to comb it through. Doesn’t dry out your hair. My only one request would be is to have an extra pump they always break then it’s hard to use. It last me about two to three months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for normal hair, but not for thick and dry hair
reviews.reviewText: Good conditioner, but not as "deep conditioning" as we needed it to be. If you have normal hair, this would work as a deep conditioner. For my daughter though, who is half African American and half Caucasian, it did not work well enough. I had to use lots of it, and in combination with olive oil. Since finishing the bottle we have used mixed chicks products, which also weren't saturating her hair well. Finally, we found in the ethnic isles the brand SheaMoisture. They have a kids line, carrot&mango extra-nourishing that REALLY does the trick! I've tried a couple other conditioners as well and that one is the best for getting knots out and really saturating thick, dry hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 14, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Love this conditioner on my daughters curly hair. It's normally a nightmare to work with and we've recently started following the curly girl routine where we don't use shampoo but do a co-wash instead followed by conditioner. It uses a lot of conditioner. A lot. 😀 This is a huge bottle, lovely pump dispenser which makes it easy to use in the shower or bath which is especially handy when working with a reluctant 3 year old. It has a fairly light, fresh fragrance which is quite pleasant but different to the average children's chemical smelling products. Her hair is far less tangled after using this, but I still use their detangling spray daily as well. I'm really pleased with the conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 29, 2016
reviews.reviewText: It works - though if you comb your hair while it's in there's no need for de-tangler (for adults at least)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 16, 2014
reviews.reviewText: We have a variety of hair textures in my home and all love the original sprout products. Conditioner leaves hair soft & healthy looking after wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 24, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: Hopefully it does what it suggests

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 29, 2014
